title: Chicken kokkinisto with orzo pasta
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '1 onion, chopped', '4 chicken legs, rinsed and patted dry', '4 cloves garlic, pressed', '400g passata', '450ml water', '2 bay leaves', '1 pinch ground cloves', 'salt and ground black pepper to taste', '450g uncooked orzo pasta']
